name: Soft Pretzels I
author: Colleen
summary: These pretzels taste just like the ones you get in the mall!  Serve with your favorite cheese sauce or mustard.  Bet you can't eat just one!
ingredients: 1 ⅓ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
directions: In a large bowl, dissolve the yeast and sugar in the warm water
Mix in butter or margarine, flour, and salt
Cut dough into short strips, roll into ropes, and shape into pretzels
Cover, and let rise on a greased baking sheet for about 45 minutes
In a cast iron or other nonaluminum pan, bring water and baking soda almost to a boil
Gently lower pretzels into water for about 1 minute, turning once
Do not let water come to a full boil
Remove pretzels, and return to greased baking sheet
Bake at 475 degrees F (245 degrees C) for about 12 minutes
